title: 新约 - 歌罗西书(Colossians) - 第 4 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 歌罗西书(Colossians) -- 第 4 章 ( 本篇共有 4 章 )

lineList.en: Masters, give unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.
lineList.cn: 你们作主人的，要公公平平的待仆人，因为知道你们也有一位主在天上。

lineList.en: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;
lineList.cn: 你们要恒切祷告，在此儆醒感恩。

lineList.en: Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:
lineList.cn: 也要为我们祷告，求神给我们开传道的门，能以讲基督的奥秘，（我为此被捆锁）。

lineList.en: That I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
lineList.cn: 叫我按着所该说的话，将这奥秘发明出来。

lineList.en: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.
lineList.cn: 你们要爱惜光阴，用智慧与外人交往。

lineList.en: Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.
lineList.cn: 你们的言语要常常带着和气，好像用盐调和，就可知道该怎样回答各人。

lineList.en: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, who is a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:
lineList.cn: 有我亲爱的兄弟推基古要将我一切的事都告诉你们。他是忠心的执事，和我一同作主的仆人。

lineList.en: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;
lineList.cn: 我特意打发他到你们那里去，好叫你们知道我们的光景，又叫他安慰你们的心。

lineList.en: With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things which are done here.
lineList.cn: 我又打发一位亲爱忠心的兄弟阿尼西母同去。他也是你们那里的人。他们要把这里一切的事都告诉你们。

lineList.en: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister's son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)
lineList.cn: 与我一同坐监的亚里达古问你们安。巴拿巴的表弟马可也问你们安。（说到这马可，你们已经受了吩咐。他若到了你们那里，你们就接待他

lineList.en: And Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.
lineList.cn: 耶数又称犹士都，也问你们安。奉割里的人中，只有这三个人，是为神的国与我一同作工的。也是叫我心里得安慰的。

lineList.en: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.
lineList.cn: 有你们那里的人，作基督耶稣仆人的以巴弗问你们安。他在祷告之间，常为你们竭力的祈求，愿你们在神一切的旨意上，得以完全。信心充足，能站立得稳。

lineList.en: For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them that are in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.
lineList.cn: 他为你们和老底嘉并希拉波立的弟兄，多多的劳苦。这是我可以给他作见证的。

lineList.en: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.
lineList.cn: 所亲爱的医生路加，和底马问你们安。

lineList.en: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.
lineList.cn: 请问老底嘉的弟兄和宁法，并他家里的教会安。

lineList.en: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.
lineList.cn: 你们念了这书信，便交给老底嘉的教会，叫他们也念。你们也要念从老底嘉来的书信。

lineList.en: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.
lineList.cn: 要对亚基布说，务要谨慎，尽你从主所受的职分。

lineList.en: The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen.
lineList.cn: 我保罗亲笔问你们安。你们要记念我的捆锁。愿恩惠常与你们同在。
